entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries or rain showers. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries or rain showers beginning near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
